modName: Followers No Longer Have Hunting Bow
summary: No more hidden bow and arrows, just fists.
descriptionHtml:
It's gone, not just droppable now but GONE. Followers will not use a bow unless you give them one - and they need arrows, too! If they don't have any weapons and are out of magicka to cast spells, they'll fight unarmed.
Nothing else done to vanilla settings; no excess options, new powers or hoopla.
Probably compatible with other follower mods, only changes one small piece of code - just make sure this one loads last.
NOT compatible with Multiple Followers mod (found on Bethesda forums)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: mrjentipede
